title: Too Blunt? President Obama Uses the N-Word
text:
Tom Sullivan Jun 22, 2015 
While taping the “WTF with Marc Maron” podcast on Friday, President Barack Obama was asked about last week’s horrific shooting in Charleston and the issue of race. 
Unfortunately, mass shootings and race are two topics the President has spoken a lot about since he’s taken office, but it was his use of a taboo word that is raising eyebrows … 
President Obama dropped the “N-Bomb”: 
“Racism, we are not cured of it. And it’s not just a matter of it not being polite to say n*gger in public…That’s not the measure of whether racism still exists or not. It’s not just a matter of overt discrimination. Societies don’t, overnight, completely erase everything that happened 200 to 300 years prior.” 
And here’s the sound … (WARNING: OFFENSIVE LANGUAGE) 
Was the President wrong to use such a toxic word?
